title: Plaza Las Americas Food Court
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Fast food, Juice bar, Take-out, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Plaza las Americas is the city main mall, and inside you will find various eateries. Lo Tipico has few vegetarian options which you could ask to omit cheese, cream, butter in cooking. Piri Pollo sells mainly chicken but has lentil burger (no egg), which you could ask to omit cheese and cream. Subway offers sandwich which you might ask for customization. At Las Quekas order flor de calabaza, huitlacoche or champi√±ones sopes without cream. Nutrisa sells texturized seasoned soy meats to take home. Outside the west entrance there is a small hut selling mainly corn.
